name: Halfling
description: Cherished and guided by gods who value life, home, and hearth, halflings gravitate toward bucolic havens where family and community help shape their lives. That said, many halflings possess a brave and adventurous spirit that leads them on journeys of discovery, affording them the chance to explore a bigger world and make new friends along the way.

traits.name: Brave
traits.description: You have Advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the Frightened condition.

saving_throw_advantages: to avoid or end Frightened condition

traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
traits.description: You can move through the space of any creature that is a size larger than you, but you can't stop in the same space.

grants.movement: can move through larger creatures' spaces without stopping

traits.name: Luck
traits.description: When you roll a 1 on the d20 of a D20 Test, you can reroll the die, and you must use the new roll.

traits.name: Naturally Stealthy
traits.description: You can take the Hide action even when you are obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than you.

grants.hide: can Hide when obscured by larger creatures
